Type Description: Novice Spell: Call forth holy spirits to attack.
Description: TP usage: 14

Type Description: Advanced Spell: Create a magic circle
Description: to launch a laser of light.

Type Description: Advanced Spell: Run an enemy through with
Description: a divine spear.

Type Description: Altered Arte: Restore a lot of HP to one ally. TP usage: 16
Description: Learn with 50 uses

Type Description: Altered Arte: Call forth spirits of wind to attack.
Description: TP usage: 28

Type Description: Burst Arte: Attack the enemy with light
Description: magic followed by a huge shockwave.

Type Description: Alters from Radiant Ruin
Description: Hell Fire

Type Description: Alters from Radiant Ruin
Description: Athenor

Type Description: Alters from Radiant Ruin
Description: Gale

Type Description: Alters from Radiant Ruin
Description: Great Deluge

Type Description: Base Arte: Randomly select a new fighting
Description: style. Each style comes with its own effects. Level 1

Type Description: Base Arte: Fire a bullet at the enemy. The shot
Description: varies with form. Be sure to try them all!

Type Description: Base Arte: Attack with a jack-in-the-box.
Description: Look forward to what's inside! TP usage: 12

Type Description: Base Arte: Toss a bomb and throw knives
Description: at it. When it explodes is up to luck!

Type Description: Base Arte: Throw a knife up in the air, and
Description: see what falls back down. Aye, rain down!

Type Description: Base Arte: Search for dropped Gald.
Description: No one can deny the value of money!

Type Description: Arcane Arte: Clobber the enemy with a frying pan,
Description: then cook a random dish. Effect differs with the dish.

Type Description: Arcane Arte: Slash with a knife, then change
Description: the finish by pressing either [Attack] , [Arte] , or [Guard] .

Type Description: Arcane Arte: Slash with a knife and jump, then change
Description: the mid-air follow-up by pressing [Attack] , [Arte] , or [Guard] .

Type Description: Arcane Arte: Summon a pot from the sky.
Description: Who knows what's inside? Have a taste!

Type Description: Arcane Arte: Toss a card, then bet high with [Attack] or low with [Guard] . Damage goes up if you keep betting!
Description: TP usage: 21

Type Description: Arcane Arte: Fly to the sky on a rocket and
Description: see what the stars have in store for you.

Type Description: Altered Arte: Shoot your gun rapid-fire.
Description: Attack properties vary by battle form.

Type Description: Altered Arte: Give the enemy a special
Description: present. I've got a bomb for you!

Type Description: Altered Arte: Throw a knife up into the
Description: air and see what kind of icicles fall.

Type Description: Altered Arte: Bump into the enemy and
Description: swipe some Gald. Whoops, I'm so sorry!

Type Description: Altered Arte: Saut?� the enemy in a big frying
Description: pan. Keep an eye on the meal you get!

Type Description: Altered Arte: Create a magic triangle with throwing knives.
Description: Change the finish by pressing either [Attack] , [Arte] , or [Guard] .

Type Description: Altered Arte: A fancy Arte used by the
Description: Shrewd Guardian. Attached to title.

Type Description: Novice Spell: Randomly use a variety of
Description: novice magic spells. Spells vary by form. TP usage: 10

Type Description: Novice Spell: Apply an elemental attribute to an
Description: ally. The applied element is selected randomly. TP usage: 12

Type Description: Advanced Spell: Select a card with [Attack] or [Arte]
Description: to cast a random spell. TP usage: 50

Type Description: Advanced Spell: Deal damage based on the
Description: poker hand dealt. I'm the legendary gambler!

Type Description: Advanced Spell: A forbidden spell with unknown
Description: results. Aye, even I don't have a clue! TP usage: 60

Type Description: Altered Arte: Randomly use a variety of
Description: intermediate magic spells. Spells vary by form. TP usage: 30

Type Description: Altered Arte: Deal damage based on your
Description: mahjong hand. Aye, I'm saving my luck!

Type Description: Burst Arte: Throw knives, shoot your gun, and
Description: draw a card with [Attack] or [Arte] for a flashy finish.

Type Description: Alters from Glittering Rain
Description: Hell Fire

Description: Athenor

Type Description: Alters from Glittering Rain
Description: Gale
